snippet: We announced yesterday morning the approach to our port of the U. S. brig Advance, one of the ships sent to the Arctic seas by Mr. HENRY GRINNELL, of this city, in search of Sir JOHN FRANKLIN. The Advance came up rapidly, and reached the Navy Yard...
lead_paragraph: We announced yesterday morning the approach to our port of the U. S. brig Advance, one of the ships sent to the Arctic seas by Mr. HENRY GRINNELL, of this city, in search of Sir JOHN FRANKLIN. The Advance came up rapidly, and reached the Navy Yard at Brooklyn at about 12 o'clock.

headline.main: THE ARCTIC EXPEDITION.; Search for Sir John Franklin. RETURN OF THE AMERICAN SQUADRON.
